name: Black and White (itch)
description:
Black and White Control White protecting Black against black colors CONTROLS

Control White by sliding through the screen and Black moves in the opposite direction.

OVERVIEW

Black and White like each others colors that means that they always have to be touching their opposite colors if Black touches its own color its health would decrease(rundown)

But fortunately White likes white balls which you are to collect on the other hand black balls are Black's cancer.

When Black dies its all over. You have to keep Black away from its own color as you accelerate in this endless runner

This is an unfinished project but if i should add more features, stages and/or music please say so in the comments.
